segments.text: Hello , Green Trading Company . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm Mr . Stephen's secretary . He has an appointment with Mr . Green today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it will be at three o ' clock this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid we have to reschedule it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Didn't we make that appointment a long time ago ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm very sorry . But Mr . Stephen must leave for Hong Kong right away .
segments.speaker: S2
